languages.text: "Малый корабельный конклав погрузился в инфомедитацию, чтобы найти ответ на этот вопрос. Боюсь, нам придется подождать".
"The ship's minor conclave has delved into datameditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."
languages.original_text: "Малый корабельный конклав погрузился в инфомедитацию, чтобы найти ответ на этот вопрос. Боюсь, нам придется подождать".

traits.locale_text: "The ship's minor conclave has gone into infomeditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."
"The ship's minor conclave has gone into infomeditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."
"The ship's minor conclave has delved into infomeditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."
"The ship's minor conclave has delved into infomeditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."
"The ship's minor conclave has delved into datameditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."

languages.text: “船上的所有技术人员都进入了技术冥想状态，试图找到这个问题的答案。恐怕我们得等一阵子了。”
languages.original_text: "The ship's minor conclave has delved into datameditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."

traits.locale_text: “船上的所有技术人员都进入了技术冥想状态，试图找到这个问题的答案。恐怕我们得等一阵子了。”

languages.text: « Le conclave mineur du vaisseau s'est plongé dans un état de métaméditation pour trouver une réponse à cette question. Nous allons devoir patienter, je le crains. »
languages.original_text: "The ship's minor conclave has delved into datameditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."

traits.locale_text: « Le conclave mineur du vaisseau s'est plongé dans un état de métaméditation pour trouver une réponse à cette question. Nous allons devoir patienter, je le crains. »

languages.text: "Das kleine Konklave des Schiffs ist in den Zustand der Datenmeditation eingetaucht, um eine Antwort auf diese Frage zu erhalten. Wir werden wohl noch ein wenig warten müssen."
languages.original_text: "The ship's minor conclave has delved into datameditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."

traits.locale_text: "Das kleine Konklave des Schiffs ist in den Zustand der Infomeditation eingetaucht, um eine Antwort auf diese Frage zu erhalten. Wir werden wohl noch ein wenig warten müssen."
"Das kleine Konklave des Schiffs ist in den Zustand der Infomeditation eingetaucht, um eine Antwort auf diese Frage zu erhalten. Wir werden wohl noch ein wenig warten müssen."

languages.text: «El cónclave menor de la nave ha entrado en estado de meditación de datos para averiguar la respuesta a esta pregunta, así que me temo que tendremos que esperar».
languages.original_text: "The ship's minor conclave has delved into datameditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."

traits.locale_text: «El cónclave menor de la nave ha entrado en estado de meditación de datos para averiguar la respuesta a esta pregunta, así que me temo que tendremos que esperar».

languages.text: 「船の小規模秘密会議は、この質問の答えを見つけるために、データメディテーションへと入って行った。残念ながら、待つしかないようだ」
languages.original_text: "The ship's minor conclave has delved into datameditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."

traits.locale_text: 「船の小規模秘密会議は、この質問の答えを見つけるために、データメディテーションへと入って行った。残念ながら、待つしかないようだ」

languages.text: "Geminin küçük meclisi, sorunuzun cevabını bulmak için veri meditasyonuna başladı. Maalesef beklememiz gerekecek."
languages.original_text: "The ship's minor conclave has delved into datameditation to find the answer to this question. I'm afraid we're going to have to wait."
